entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for named synchronization objects that are restricted to the creating user (where applicable) #91147
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] WorkloadNotRequiredForInvariantGlobalization timeout waiting for web server url #91143
  • JIT: antigen test case fails when unwind fragment size is set very low #91139
    Future
  • Type and content inconsistency between TcpClient.Client.LocalEndPoint/RemoteEndPoint and TcpConnectionInformation.LocalEndPoint/RemoteEndPoint #91137
  • System.Text.Json DateTime and DateTimeOffset only write six (6) significant digits for the seconds fraction #91134
  • Android NTLM: Empty Credentials now throws PlatformNotSupportedException #91131
  • Missing Callstack Information For Outer Exception Thrown Within Catch Block #91125
  • [API Proposal]: Add `string.ReplaceAt` #91124
  • LoggerMessage source generator does not work with logger from primary constructor. #91121
    9.0.0
  • API Discussion: HttpContent #91111
  • SSL_CERT_DIR should support multiple paths #91110
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Jump into middle of try region"' in 'TestClass:Method22(byref,TestClass+S2,byref,byref,byref):TestClass+S2:this' during 'Find loops' #91108
    8.0.0
  • DataContractJsonSerializer throws exception - Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') #91104
  • DateTime.DaysInMonth minor performance tweaks #91103
  • Confused about unobserved exception #91100
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/Instantiation/Positive/MultipleInterface04/MultipleInterface04.sh #91099

Closed

  • ComWrappers.GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance becomes expensive during the Get cached RCW scenario when called from multiple threads #90964
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when arrays don't have any [In] or [Out] attributes #90884
    8.0.0
  • Build fails with "eng/common/tools.sh: line 474: 537 Segmentation fault" #76759
  • Exception on `MakeGenericMethod` called on a static interface method from `GetInterfaceMap`'s `TargetMethods` #90351
    9.0.0
  • Heavy stuttering/freezes due to GC pauses caused by System.IndexOutOfRangeException in TlsOverPerCoreLockedStacksArrayPool during gen2 GC #91136
  • Explicit static interface implementation compiles but program crashes with "Fatal error" with .NET 7 #86993
    7.0.x
  • ProfilingAPI: `ICorProfilerInfo14::GetNonGCHeapBounds` deadlock on .NET 8.0-preview7 #90830
    8.0.0
  • Are synchronous Sockets thread-safe? #26843
    8.0.0
  • Socket.Send not thread-safe on Linux #44422
    8.0.0
  • Improvements to NativeAOT compilation via meta-data #91113
  • Feature Request: Fully Support AoT Compilation & CIL Stripping for Android #44855
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Runtime_82535 crashes on osx x64 #89585
    8.0.0
  • native aot regression in .net 8.0 #91065
  • IAsyncEnumerator question - clear Current when MoveNextAsync is called #90855

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use reader/writer lock instead of mutex for `ComWrappers` RCW cache #91149
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rename EnC related defines #91146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix diagnostic creation to ensure including the URI #91145
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2252827 #91144
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Add docs for new protected APIs added in Reflection.Emit #91142
    area-System.Reflection
  • Allow for PublishAot and PublishSingleFile at the same time #91141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91138
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable trimming for crossgen2 publishing and fix symbol bug #91135
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91133
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Remove FEATURE_BASICFREEZE #91132
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI test #91126
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang for compatibility with Xcode 13 #91118
    Servicing-consider, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure, os-ios, os-tvos, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang for compatibility with Xcode 13 #91117
    Servicing-consider, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure, os-ios, os-tvos, 7.0.x
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix invalid user info processing #91106
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing tfm net9.0 changes #91105
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of a libraries tests run #91101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Use reader/writer lock instead of mutex for `ComWrappers` RCW cache #91120
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Recommend [In] and [Out] attributes on array parameters #91094
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix diagnostic creation to ensure including the URI #91123
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix physical promotion creating overlapping local uses #91088
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] fix MSBuild typo #91127
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #91130
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Emit interceptor info correctly when invocation expr is on separate line #91107
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in runtime copy of Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #91090
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Skip Create(ToScalar(Dot(...))) transformation on mismatched types #91089
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90968
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Use xunit.assert fork in dotnet/runtime #91091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • New Microsoft.BCL.Numerics package #91074
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Split crossgen2 into two source build intermediates #91128
    needs-area-label
  • Regression test for issue #86993 #90906
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] fix MSBuild typo #91119
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Switch HostVersionCompatibility test to use 6.0 as old runtime #91098
    area-Host
  • Disable two H2 MultipleConnections tests #91115
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the compile error after #88034. #91109
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser] download sequence optimization #90388
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in pretest.proj #91102
    needs-area-label
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading

Updated

  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Reserve FOH segments in ExecutionAllocator and properly report them to debugger #90047
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Include dotnet/hostfxr/hostpolicy symbols in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host/Runtime packages #91031
    area-Host
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][WIP] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] Fix stack_limit handling #91095
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix nullability annotations of MemberDescriptor.AttributeArray #91022
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add ability to pad profile counters and adjust scalable count th… #91081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #90488
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
